conclusion: Graph shows velocity in m/s over time in seconds; x-axis is time, y-axis is velocity.
Velocity increases from 0 to 20 m/s over the first 10 seconds.
Acceleration must be positive since velocity increases from 0 to 20 m/s.
Object is accelerating upward since velocity increases from 0 to 20 m/s.
